thread.title: A. Long
thread.title_full: Smart Start, Inc. reviewed by A. Long

author: A. Long
title: A. Long
text: I've had the pleasure of being on the receiving end of a phone call with a representative that had absolutely no goal but to read off of a script and collect a paycheck. It's not fun. Today, I experienced the complete opposite. Bobbie Hennig was amazingly efficient. She asked the right questions and offered multiple solutions/scenarios while talking me through my dilemma. She was polite and very down to earth and sincere in her delivery. Thank you for providing the opportunity to speak to someone who brightened my day.
